overview:
Xavier Desmaison is a Partner of Antidox, a strategic and public affairs consulting firm. Since 2006, he teaches European Law and PR - digital PR in Sciences-Po Paris. Angel investor and art lover, he is a member of the board of directors of many social media start-ups (including Covivo, Flype, Megalopolis, Moxity, Stand Alone Media) and of the editorial board of the art magazine Prussian Blue.

Sciences-Po and Essec business school graduated, Xavier was business developer in a start-up before joining Yahoo ! France. He then worked in CA Cheuvreux (London) as a financial analyst before driving strategic and monitoring assignments in Arcelor and Caisse Nationale des Caisses d’Épargne board. From 2004 to 2010, he was Partner at Tendances Institut, a consulting firm.
